Game_Structure

Class GUI_setup

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game_Structure.GUI_setup

  • public class GUI_setup
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is implemented as a View and Controller class (Project is trying to approach to Model-view-controller design pattern) It create the First frame for game setup with all init of GUI and the setup frame (I learnt how to use card layout and switch between panel but I decided to keep this frame setup as it shows a progress of learning and I belive seperating Game Setup and Game body does make the game "cleaner" in some aspect)
    Author:
    Edward Wong - University of Canterbury SENG_201 13/05/2020
